feed.title: Hritik Arasu
feed.subtitle: Hritik Arasu's blunders into python, robotics, and machine learning.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content: This is my first post on my blog to test the capabilities of Jekyll. I will also be showcasing some data visualization and simple linear regression using python.
entry.summary: This is my first post on my blog to test the capabilities of Jekyll. I will also be showcasing some data visualization and simple linear regression using python.
